resources.string: BizQRd is the world\'s premier app for sharing your contact information with others using an easy to create QR code that can be scanned by either iPhone, iPad, or Android device.
To create your personal QR code, follow these simple steps:

1) Click on the "Gears" icon in the right corner of the navigation bar to open the Settings view. In this view, you choose how much or how little info you want to share in your QR code. Anything in this list that is checked will be included in the QR code, so long as you have provided that info on your Contact card.
2) Choose the contact that you want to share from your list of Contacts by tapping the first icon in the tab bar. This is usually your own personal Contact card, but it doesn\'t have to be.

3) Next, you need to choose the image that will provide the background for your QR code. Tap the second icon in the tab bar to choose a picture from your collection of photos. Images with faces can confuse the scanner, so try and avoid thoseâ€¦
4) When you are satisfied with your QR code and have picked your background image, tap the third button in the tab bar to save your creation in your Photos collection.
